mapper.update: update cms_article set status=#{status} , updated=now() where id=#{id}
update cms_article set hot=#{hot} , updated=now() where id=#{id}
update cms_article set commentCnt = commentCnt + 1 where id=#{value}
mapper.select: select a.id,a.content,a.title,a.picture,a.channel_id AS channelId,a.category_id categoryId,a.user_id AS userId,a. hits,a.hot,a.status,a.deleted,a.created,a.updated, u.username, GROUP_CONCAT(t.tagname) as tags,a.commentCnt from cms_article as a left join cms_user u on u.id=a.user_id left join cms_article_tag_middle as atm on atm.aid=a.id LEFT join cms_tag as t on t.id=atm.tid where a.id=#{value} and a.deleted=0 group by a.id

select a.id,a.content,a.title,a.picture,a.channel_id AS channelId,a.category_id categoryId,a.user_id AS userId,a. hits,a.hot,a.status,a.deleted,a.created,a.updated, cat.`name` as catName , chn.`name` as chnName, GROUP_CONCAT(t.tagname) as tags from cms_article as a left join cms_channel as chn on chn.id=a.channel_id left join cms_category as cat on cat.id=a.category_id left join cms_article_tag_middle as atm on atm.aid=a.id LEFT join cms_tag as t on t.id=atm.tid where a.user_id=#{userId} and a.deleted=0 group by a.id order by a.created desc

select a.id,a.content,a.title,a.picture,a.channel_id AS channelId,a.category_id categoryId,a.user_id AS userId, a.hits,a.hot,a.status,a.deleted,a.created,a.updated, cat.`name` as catName , chn.`name` as chnName, GROUP_CONCAT(t.tagname) as tags ,u.username from cms_article as a left join cms_user u on u.id=a.user_id left join cms_channel as chn on chn.id=a.channel_id left join cms_category as cat on cat.id=a.category_id left join cms_article_tag_middle as atm on atm.aid=a.id LEFT join cms_tag as t on t.id=atm.tid
and a.status=#{status}
and a.deleted=0
group by a.id order by a.created desc

select a.id,a.commentCnt,a.content,a.title,a.picture,a.channel_id AS channelId,a.category_id categoryId,a.user_id AS userId, a.hits,a.hot,a.status,a.deleted,a.created,a.updated, cat.`name` as catName , chn.`name` as chnName, GROUP_CONCAT(t.tagname) as tags ,u.username from cms_article as a left join cms_user u on u.id=a.user_id left join cms_channel as chn on chn.id=a.channel_id left join cms_category as cat on cat.id=a.category_id left join cms_article_tag_middle as atm on atm.aid=a.id LEFT join cms_tag as t on t.id=atm.tid where a.hot>0 and a.status=1 and a.deleted=0
and a.title like concat('%',#{title},'%')
group by a.id order by a.hot desc,a.created desc

select a.id,a.content,a.title,a.picture,a.channel_id AS channelId,a.category_id categoryId,a.user_id AS userId, a.hits,a.hot,a.status,a.deleted,a.created,a.updated, cat.`name` as catName , chn.`name` as chnName, GROUP_CONCAT(t.tagname) as tags ,u.username from cms_article as a left join cms_user u on u.id=a.user_id left join cms_channel as chn on chn.id=a.channel_id left join cms_category as cat on cat.id=a.category_id left join cms_article_tag_middle as atm on atm.aid=a.id LEFT join cms_tag as t on t.id=atm.tid where a.status=1 and a.deleted=0 group by a.id order by a.created desc limit 5
